short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extensions for Chart Nerd, allow easy access to token, url & table name

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A complementary extension for Chart Nerd, that help extract notion table URL, table name, token & autofills the input in Chart Nerd, saving you time.
